name: Flappy Rapstar: The Lil Weezy Edition
name_original: Flappy Rapstar: The Lil Weezy Edition
description:
Lil Flyin Weezy is Simple. It's Addictive. And it's REALLY, REALLY HARD. Tap to make your rap star go up and try not to smack him against the pipes!

Don't forget to tell your friends about this new version of Lil Flying weezy inspired by Flappy Birds, Weezy and Tiny Flying Drizzy!

PLUS...

Try and get to the top of the global Leaderboard... GOOD LUCK!!!

"Lil Flying Weezy : The Tiny Flyin Lil Wayne Bird" - The new and improved Lil Flying Weezy is even more fun and addicting! Help Flappy Lil Wayne find his way!
